name: Asteroidx
description:
Addicting Sci-Fi Space Shooter on you have to destroy all that you can like asteroids, meteors and enemies.

Collect all kind of powerup! lives, shield, megablast and pieces to unlock the triple sho.

Also if you are in trouble or want to catch some item fast you can use the boost to Speed-Up your ship! Only check if you have enough fuel!

The game includes some social features like Online Scores and some share buttons to post on twitter how good you are in the game.


Features
  • Infinite gameplay
  • Power-Ups
  • Retro style & Sounds
  • Easy mouse control
  • Online Scores
  • Share your scores on twitter
  • Gamepad support


Instructions

Move: Use the mouse
Active Speed-Up: Press & Hold left click
S : On/Off Sounds

Added support to Gamepad.
Press 0 -> Deactivate
Press 1 -> Activate and Press any button on Gamepad
Hold A -> SpeedUp if you have enough fuel.


Credits

Music/SFX: Evil-Mind.com

Game made in with Construct 2.
